General.Name: Honkarakenne Oyj B
General.Description: Honkarakenne Oyj designs, manufactures, and sells log and solid wood house packages in Finland. The company offers contemporary log homes, log cabins and holiday lodges, custom log homes and cabins and traditional log homes, as well as massive and insulated walls, corner types, roof, interior wall, windows, and sliding doors. In addition, it also provides design and construction services, and log billets and processed by-products. The company sells its houses under the Honka brand name. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Karstula, Finland.

6.Name: Mr. Jorma  Ruuska
6.Title: Head of Karstula Factory, Paltamo Factory & New Markets Director and CEO of Honka Blockhaus GmbH
